headline: American Water Releases Annual Sustainability Report
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., July 28, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that it has issued its ninth Sustainability Report covering its industry leadership and sustainable impact on communities across the U.S.
